gwt.g3d.client.gl2.WebGLTexture

Packages that use WebGLTexture
gwt.g3d.client.gl2 Contains wrappers for WebGL (OpenGL ES 2.0). 
gwt.g3d.client.texture Contains helper classes for managing textures.

 WebGLTexture GL2.createTexture()
